knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
CanadaIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "http://www.publicdomainpictures.net/pictures/10000/velka/1-1192373997.jpg",
  iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 50
)

CanadaLatLong <- data.frame(
  name = c("Ottawa", "Toronto", "Montreal"),
  pop = c(947000, 2810000, 1740000),
  lat = c(45.4215, 43.6532, 45.5017),
  lng = c(-75.6972, -79.3832, -73.5673))

CanadaLatLong %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = CanadaIcon)%>%
  addCircles(weight = 1, radius = sqrt(CanadaLatLong$pop)*30)
```
